text: Idaṃ kho pana bhikkhave dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ yo tassāyeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayo
edit: Idaṃ kho pana bhikkhave dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ – yo tassāyeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayo

translations.transtext: [That], monks, [is] this noble truth of the cessation of suffering, which totally-craving-free cessation of that craving [is] abandonment, forsaking, liberation, [and] non-attachment.
